text: Evanna Patricia Lynch (born 16 August 1991) is an Irish actress. She became famous by playing Luna Lovegood, a supporting character in the Harry Potter movie series. Lynch was cast as Luna at the age of 14, having acted only in school plays before. She first played Luna in Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007), Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (2009), and Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows â€“ Part 1 (2010) and Part 2 (2011). She also voiced Luna in the first of the movie's two video games. Lynch's work on the series earned her two award nominations. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Child actors Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish voice actors Category:People with anorexia
title: Evanna Lynch
